alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 10:33PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coffee, northwestern Pierce, Atkinson, northwestern Ware, Bacon, northwestern Wayne, southeastern Jeff Davis and Appling Counties through 1115 PM EST... At 1033 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Baxley to near Willacoochee. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Jesup, Baxley, Alma, Pearson, Willacoochee, Broxton, Graham, Surrency and Nicholls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EST for southeastern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne
